text: I’m so over music festivals.
They're so fucking corporatized.
Totally, except for Coachella, which is more than a festival.
Yeah, it’s more a way of life. We HEAR a buzzing. They look up.
A DRONE -- the PHANTOM 3 STANDARD QUADCOPTER -- hovers hi above them.
What the fuck? From inside, JASLYN, 16, approaches the sliding glass doo She has the beauty of Kendall Jenner and the intelligence Kendall Jenner. She walks into the glass door.
Owww! Not again. Jaslyn, holding her head, opens the slider and joins them
Do you hear that buzzing?
(re her head) You can hear that, too?

head_text.subj: THE SMILING FACES OF THREE SIXTH GRADE BOYS.

text: One of them mans the drone on an iPad, which feeds into FLAT SCREEN TV.
Tits.
The girls quickly cover themselves.

I know who it is.
ON THE DRONE FEED, the girls give them the finger.

Why do they hate us? They don’t even know us. This is MAX, 12, flanked by the two other boys. He isn’t coolest or the smartest kid, but he’s cool and smart enou Loves dinosaurs and skateboards. Recently discovered masturbation. Two small hands snatch the iPad from Max.

Holy fucking shit! Drop the towels! Drop the towels! This is QUENTIN, 12. He’s short and stout and isn’t happy about it. Considers himself hyper-intelligent, but really just parrots sentence fragments he hears adults say. Rece discovered masturbation. Another boy grabs a couch cushion and humps it wildly.
Ayyyyyyyyeeeeeeeee! ! This is FABRIZIO, 12. Hyper and horny foreign exchange st The language barrier is very real. Dresses like he’s abou have lunch in Capri. Been masturbating for ten months.

I’m going lower. Get ready for some major titillation. BOY’S VOICE (0.S.) What the fuck?! TURN TO REVEAL XAVIER-RAYMOND, 12, bounding down the stai Everyone calls him X-Ray. Cool nickname, but he’s neuroti suffers from IBS and is prone to crying fits. He’s just c from upstairs, where he was masturbating.
Your neighbor's in a bikini! And she has friends over! Girls!
I don’t care! I fucking told you, I’m not allowed to use my dad’s stuff unless supervised. You guys never listen to me!
Just five more minutes.
No! X-Ray lunges at Quentin, who yanks the control away.
The Girls stare up as the Drone LURCHES from side to side DROPS thirty feet, SPINS out of control.
INT. X-RAY’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - SAME Quentin and X-Ray jostle for control of the iPad. Fabrizi now dry-humps the pillow from behind.
You're gonna break it! Give it!

Fine! Quentin lets go, sending X-Ray falling back. The iPad SLI under the couch. They all GASP.  EXT. HANNAH’S HOUSE - BACKYARD - SAME The Drone suddenly NOSEDIVES, going straight for the Girl who scream and DUCK for cover. INT. X-RAY’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - SAME
The boys watch in horror as the DRONE plummets. Max scram to the couch and stretches out his arm. The iPad is just of reach.
Lift it! The others can barely lift the couch, but it’s just enoug for Max to reach the iPad.
Got it!
The drone STABILIZES mere feet from the ground. INT. X-RAY’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - SAME The boys breathe a sigh of relief.
Almost like a zombie movie, the three GIRLS move toward t drone, arms outstretched.
Go up! Go up! Go up! Max jerks the iPad up. The Drone rises, barely escaping Lily's outstretched hand. The guys CHEER, until --

Hannah LAUNCHES herself off a chaise lounge, GRABBING the landing skids of the drone and taking it down.  INT. X-RAY’S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - SAME The camera shakes, catching images of grass, sky and then HANNAH'S FACE comes into focus. The boys stare in horror.
Listen, you little -- A hand covers the drone’s camera. The screen goes BLACK. a beat, all three girls appear in frame, smiling and flir
Hey guys, we want to hang out. We’re soooo lonely over here.
I need someone to rub lotion on me.
Slack-jawed. Quentin turns to the others.
Let's go. Fabrizio pulls a travel-sized Axe Body Spray from his poc and douses himself.
Wait! What if it’s a trap?
Not everything is a trap, Max. Just deal with the fact that they want to party. We’ll go over there, lick some tits, and get the drone back.
They’re four grades older than us!
They horny cougars.
We’re not going to a stranger's house. We'll wait for your mom to come home. She can walk us over.
Fine. Whatever.
They have my dad’s drone. I’1l go myself.
Wait, you can’t go over there alone. They've been smoking drugs all day.
We're coming with you. They could be erratic. They all head for the door. Quentin stops, considering:
I hope they don’t have STDs. I/E. HANNAH’S HOUSE - DAY Hannah opens the front door to REVEAL our four boys. They all combed their hair and tucked in their shirts. Hannah towers over the boys.
Ciao, bella.
Come in, guys. We’ve been waiting for you. X-Ray clocks the drone on the kitchen island.
Thank you. This is a lovely home. The boys study the girls with a mix of fear and desire.
(quiet, to Max) They’re huge. As soon as they’ve stepped into the foyer, Lily appears behind them and SLAMS the door shut, LOCKING them in.
It’s a trap! Lily and Jaslyn block the door.
You think it’s cool to objectify women? The boys clearly have no idea what “objectify” means.
(unsure) We weren't. We were just looking at your bodies.
We need a guarantee that you’1l never objectify anyone again.
Like what?
Hannah, Lily and Jaslyn stifle laughs.
Get out here! The Boys enter, completely transformed: dresses, makeup, painted fingernails, mascara, barrettes, the works.
Ooh, I want the little one. I want to put her in my pocket.
I’m not little. My doctor says I’m going to be 5'9”, honey.
Relax, Munchkin. Hannah holds up her phone and snaps PHOTOS.
What are you gonna do with those?
Maybe I’11 send them to my sister. She's in eighth grade at John Adams. Isn’t that where you go? Hannah tosses the phone into her bright yellow BEACH BAG.
You’re gonna have to transfer schools. X-Ray begins hyperventilating. Mascara RUNS down his face
Give us... the ... drone! Lily takes the Drone and puts it on the floor. She lifts foot over it, taunting him. Hannah and Jaslyn laugh. X-Ray runs over and covers the Drone, protecting it.
Fuck you, STD bitches! They look over to see Quentin holding Hannah’s beach bag.
I have her phone! Run! Quentin races out the back, Hannah hot on his heels. X-Ra BITES Lily in the calf.
Owww ! X-Ray scoops up the Drone and races for the yard. Max and Fabrizio follow. Jaslyn jumps in front of them. Fabrizio KICKS her in the crotch. She goes down.

That’s what you get! BAM! From the ground, Jaslyn UPPERCUTS Max in his balls. crumples. X-Ray and Fabrizio scoop him up and keep runnin EXT. HANNAH’S HOUSE - BACKYARD - CONTINUOUS Quentin races alongside the pool. Hannah’s gaining. He runs past a patio chair and knocks it down, TRIPPING Hannah. The other boys hurdle over her and join Quentin. They reach an EIGHT FOOT FENCE blocking them in. To them, might as well be twenty feet.

Ten fingers! Max lifts Quentin up and over, followed by Fabrizio, who pulls Max up. Max straddles the top of the fence and lowers his arm dow X-Ray, who cradles the drone. Max strains to pull him up. Ray looks back. The girls are gaining.
Pull! Pull! He’s almost over when suddenly, he’s jerked back. Lily pu at the drone’s plastic frame.
She’s too strong! X-Ray loses his grip on the drone.
It’s slipping! Lily pulls the drone away from X-Ray. It falls to the gro She grabs his leg. X-Ray struggles to wrestle free and accidentally KICKS her in the head.
Ow! You kicked me in the head!
On accident! Lily SMASHES the drone.
Nooo! Max pulls X-Ray over the fence.
She broke the drone!! FUCK!
(calling over the fence) Fucking cougars!! A COUPLES passes pushing a stroller.
Language, girls!
Sorry. The boys RACE down the street, sundresses flapping in the

The boys run THROUGH THE TITLE and turn into X-Ray’s driveway, just as a BMW pulls in. A handsome, middle-aged man steps out. He carries himself like a former athlete. This is X-RAY’S DAD. He looks the up and down, taking in the dresses. He looks disgusted. X-RAY’S DAD (snapping) Why are you dressed like that? No one speaks. X-Ray’s Dad shakes his head. X-RAY’S DAD (CONT’D) Tell your friends you'll see them tomorrow. The boys watch as X-Ray’s Dad leads him to the front door dead man walking.
Lily drives. Hannah sits shotgun, phone to her ear. Jasly leans in from the back.
Those little shits aren’t picking up.
Should we call Jordy? Whoever Jordy is, none of them jump at this idea.
Why were we even holding Jordy’s drugs?
(as to a child) When you have two strikes, you can’t hold your own drugs, Jaslyn. And we each get a free pill.
What if those kids open the bottle and overdose on Molly? We put them in a fucking Flintstones Vitamins bottle!  11.
(optimistic) Or what if they open the bottle, take Molly, and have the best day of their lives?! Off the Girls, considering.
Quentin, struggling mightily to open a FLINTSTONES VITAMI PILL CONTAINER.
Whatever. Chewables suck. Gummies are so much better.

Max, Quentin, and Fabrizio, all dressed in SCHOOL UNIFORM sit at the front of the bus. They rummage through Hannah' bag. Fabrizio pulls out a tampon. Quentin snatches and inhales deeply. Another KID peers over and gags.
OH MY GOD! Gross! (then, calling back) Soren! They have a tampon! SOREN, 12, who looks like the son of Cindy Crawford and R Gerber, calls from the back of the bus.
Hey, Quentin, stick it up your pussy hole!
Fuck you, you sexist bitch! I'1l stick my dick up your nose! Quentin stands on the seat and starts thrusting wildly in air. Max slouches in his seat, embarrassed.
(quiet) Just sit down. This is why they’re always making fun of us.  12.
Who cares what he thinks? He has the same haircut as my sister. The bus STOPS and a few kids, including X-Ray, step on. H looks terrible.
So what happened with your dad? X-Ray hands Max a BROCHURE.
(reading) Camden Academy for Boys? (then) That’s that boarding school in Nevada. Matt Chestnut went there.
It’s where my dad went. He thinks I need it. He said I’m weak.
If he think that, he don’t know you.
You can’t go to boarding school. You couldn't even make it through tennis camp. (then) You need to stand up to him.
(defeated) I know, okay? X-Ray looks down.
He’s looking for an excuse. He said if I screw up again, I’m gone.
It’s just a stupid drone.
He doesn’t know that I broke it.
So when he finds out...  13.
(quiet) ++. I’m gone. They take this in. Quentin pulls out his phone.

Ridiculous. I’m texting my nanny. She can go to the mall and get a new drone. She has my dad’s credit card for emergencies. Problem solved. X-Ray exhales, relieved. The theme song of “PRETTY LITTLE LIARS” starts playing fr inside Max's backpack. He pulls out Hannah’s phone. The caller ID reads: LILY.
They've called a thousand times. Quentin takes the phone.
Get her passcode so we can delete the pictures. Quentin answers.
You smell like a fart and taste like shit. Quentin hangs up. Fabrizio, Quentin, and X-Ray laugh, ple with themselves.
You didn’t get the code.
Who cares? We have the phone, what are they going to do?
To establish. The bus pulls up to the curb. Waiting for them are HANNAH LILY, and JASLYN.  14.
The other students get off the bus. Our guys just stare o the window, terrified of the girls.
What do we do? We can’t go out there.
(calling to Bus Driver) We need SCAB.
No way. We’1l look like losers.
Do you wanna die??

SLO MO. Over Katy Perry’s “ROAR” -- Max, Quentin, X-Ray, and Fabrizio confidently step out of bus and join a PONY-TAILED TEACHER and eight of the LEAST POPULAR STUDENTS in the school. They’re all wearing blue smocks that read “STUDENT COALITION AGAINST BULLYING.”

(chanting) Bullying is whack, get on the right track! Bullying is whack, get on the right track! Max is mortified. This is so uncool. The SCAB MEMBERS, along with our boys, interlock arms to a HUMAN CHAIN. They march up to Hannah, Lily, and Jaslyn. SCAB LEADER, a boy with a wispy mustache and a heavy lisp addresses the girls.
When you attack one of uth, you attack all of uth! Your weakneth giffs uth strength! The Girls stare back, like “Is this happening?”
These kids stole my phone and my bag! And there’s important stuff --  15.

No, Bully! Not today! (then) Head out, headth up! The Human Chain marches to the school. As they march, we the back of their smocks reads, “I’M A SCAB FOR LIFE.” Ou boys turn back to see the girls giving them the “slit you throat” motion. Hannah’s shirt lifts up slightly, reveali hint of flesh. The boys notice.
Did you see her belly button? As the boys enter the school, “ROAR” switches from Katy P to -- an ALL BOYS CHORUS.

We pan over the bored faces of the STUDENTS until we land the faces of our four boys -- eyes closed, passionate, de connected to the performance. A music teacher, MS. GRANDY, 70s, basically deaf, accompa them on the piano.
(singing) “I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter --" On the word, “FIGHTER,” the boys all pantomime PUNCHING.
(singing) “Dancing through the fire / Cause I am the champion...” On the word, “CHAMPION,” the boys raise their arms in tri
(singing) “And you're gonna hear me roar!” On the word, “ROAR,” the boys all pantomime ROARING by rearing their heads back. The song concludes.

That was great, guys! The bell RINGS. All of the boys quickly head for the door  16. MS. GRANDY (CONT’D) Wait, wait, wait. Big night tonight. Everyone needs to be in costume by five-thirty. And make sure to go to the bathroom before we get on stage. No accidents this year. Quentin’s phone BUZZES. He looks around and then walks in closet with instruments. He closes the door behind him.
(into phone) Hola, Inez, que pasa?
Max, X-Ray, and Fabrizio exit. Soren calls out to Max.
Max! Come over here. X-Ray and Fabrizio are surprised. Max hides his excitemen
Be right back. Max jogs over. Soren leans against his locker with two equally cool kids. They all have the same haircut, where constantly flick the bangs out of their eyes.
Hey, you were really fast in gym.
Thanks.
So are you still coming to my party after the recital?
Yeah, I can’t wait.
I invited some seventh grade girls, so... could turn into a kissing party.
I‘’1l bring gum for the guys. Soren look over, notices X-Ray and Fabrizio imitating the favorite DINOSAURS.  17.
They are so random.
Yeah, but they’re kinda cool, too.
Quentin. He exits the Music Room, joining X-Ray and Fabri
Inez can't pick up the drone. Her husband needs the car.
What the fuck?!

Yeah, I don’t know why they don’t get a second car. She’s loaded. She's always sending money to her family in Guatemala. Quentin notices Max and Soren talking. They fist bump. Quentin looks very concerned.
What the shit? Max returns to the others.
Why were you bantering with that individual? (then, concerned) You didn’t invite him to Benihana after the recital, right? That’s just us. That’s our tradition.
(lying) Soren just had a question about math. Max notices that X-Ray’s eye are welling up.
What happened?
Inez can no drive.  18.
X-Ray, you can’t cry in school. It makes us all look weak. Just hold it in. X-Ray lets out a squeak. He’s on the verge.
I’m not!
The four boys are huddled in a tight stall. X-Ray is BAWL
Is gonna be okay. Quentin types into his phone.
From here to the Fashion Square Mall is... seventeen minutes. The door from the hallway opens. They all shush one anoth They listen until they hear the sound of urination.
(whispering) Okay, so we'll just miss lunch and be back by fourth period.
Who's crying? Max peers over the stall to see ROBIN, 12, nosy, peeing.
Should I get a teacher? I’m gonna get a teacher.
No, Robin! This is why people call you “narc.”
Why are you going to the mall? Fabrizio pops up.
To fuck’a your mom!  19.
You wish. My mom’s in San Diego at a wellness retreat. Quentin pops up.
Robin, get the fuck out of here!
I’m allowed to be here. It’s a free country. They return to their huddle and continue whispering.
Even if we can get to the mall, how do we get five hundred dollars?
I know how get money. We sell peaches.
Peaches? Are you kidding?
First we get money, then we go to the mall. (to X-Ray) We're not gonna let you get sent to Camden.
Do you pledge it?
I pledge it. Max extends his hand meaningfully. X-Ray takes it, formin the clasp for the “Boys and Girls Club of America.”
Second bell’s about to ring. Quentin pops up, his face red with anger.
Go suck on your mom’s fat tits!
Students roam the halls in between periods. An elderly SECURITY GUARD sits at the entrance, reading an AARP Maga article about Antonio Banderas. The boys sneak past him.
Quentin, X-Ray and Fabrizio stand on the ROOF, twenty fee up. They look down nervously at Max, who’s on the ground.

Come on, it’s easy. Fabrizio grabs onto a PALM FROND and STEPS OFF THE ROOF. weight LOWERS the frond all the way to the ground -- like SWISS FAMILY ROBINSON “ELEVATOR.” He lets go and the Palm Frond snaps back up to the roof. Quentin follows and lands on the ground. The frond snaps up to X-Ray.
I’m scared.

Just wrap your thong around the branch and slide down. (then, to Max and Fabrizio) You hear what I said to him? X-Ray throws his bag to the ground and grabs the branch. starts to lower, but then it STOPS, leaving him DANGLING feet above the ground. X-Ray’s weight is not enough to br the branch all the way down.
Help! Help!
You should’ve kept your backpack on, so you'd be heavier!
I took it off to be more nimble. X-Ray shakes, but the branch doesn’t move. A BEE buzzes b Ray’s face.
Bee! I’m allergic! He frantically tries blowing it away. The bee STINGS him.  21.
Owww!! It stung me! Get my epi-pen! My throat’s gonna close! Fabrizio springs to action and grabs X-Ray’s bag, searchi for the epi-pen.
Okay, I’m gonna drop. Catch me! Max and Quentin gather underneath X-Ray, arms outstretche He DROPS and lands between them with a THUD.
Owww! Fabrizio pulls the pen out of X-Ray’s bag and JABS it int Ray’s thigh.
Owww! CLOSE ON a UNI-BALL PEN sticking out of his leg.
What the fuck is wrong with you?!
You say a’pen! A’pen!
Epi-pen! Epi-pen! Fucking idiot! Max pulls the real EPIPEN out of the bag.
Found it! Max jabs it into X-Ray’s other leg.
(weakly) Thank you. (then, to Fabrizio) Sorry I called you an idiot.
Is okay.
The school recedes in the background. X-Ray LIMPS behind others. His pants have puncture wounds and his cheek is hugely swollen from the sting.
«+. My sister said girls hate the word, “moist.”
Why? Quentin shrugs. Max smells his armpit.
I’m moist right now. Quentin turns back and takes a photo of X-Ray’s face.
What are you doing?
Taking a snap of that baby dick on your cheek. Max smacks Quentin’s hand.
No snaps, no stories. Nothing. We can’t be tracked. We have to stay off the grid. Max's phone buzzes. He checks it. Quentin smacks Max's

We got a buyer! The guys CHEER. They step out of the woods and onto --
hand. Their celebration is short-lived as a POLICE CRUISER, lig flashing, pulls up alongside them.
Lemme do the talking. The OFFICER sticks his head out.  23.
Hello, Officer. Just want to say “All Lives Matter.”
Shouldn't you boys be in school? A moment of panic as the guys all intuitively turn to Max thinks quickly.
It’s a Jewish holiday. We're going to temple.
Oh, you're Jews? (then, gives them once- over) Stay on the sidewalks. The Officer drives off.
That was genius!
I liked it! Quentin’s annoyed that someone else is receiving adulatio

I don’t think it’s “genius” to lie about religion. With what’s happening in the world today. This seems like a deep observation. They contemplate it. INT. FABRIZIO’S HOUSE - LATER Quentin and Max play Grand Theft Auto while Fabrizio watc with interest. X-Ray peers out the window, impatiently.
Where the hell is this guy? He was supposed to be here already.
He’s coming. Relax. Max's Avatar lies prone on a rooftop, taking aim at a FEM COP, who stands beside a trash can fire. He shoots and misses.  24.
Why are you shooting that cop? You're wasting bullets.
That’s St. Cloud. She’s not even a cop. She’s bad. She just dresses like one to rob drug dealers.
My dads say that these types of games make you numb to violence. St. Cloud comes at the Avatar and Max shoots her POINT-BL in the face, causing her head to EXPLODE. None of them re
I wish you could see more brains in her hair.
If you run her over, she'll shit herself. The doorbell RINGS.
(exasperated) Finally. He’s about to open the door when --
(whispers) Wait! What if he’s a pedophile?
(considers) He can’t molest all of us.
He could if he drugs us.
If he offers you anything to drink, do not take it.
Maybe we should get some weapons, just to be safe.  25.

(through the door) One minute please! Just need to put something on! INT. FABRIZIO’S FRONT HALL - MOMENTS LATER The boys are weaponed up: Max holds a broomstick. Quentin a tennis racket. X-Ray enters with a PAINTBALL GUN.
Check it out.
Switch. Quentin snatches the paintball gun and hands X-Ray the te racket.
What the hell, Quentin? That was mine.
It’s not a toy, okay? Better that I hold it. Quentin tucks it in his elastic waistband. Fabrizio races down the steps. He’s wearing an S&M MASK a holding a set of ANAL BEADS.
Ugh, gross. Those smell like shit! They all take a strong whiff.
What are those?
I dunno. I find in Bill and Nancy’s bedroom. I use to hit. Fabrizio whips the anal beads over his shoulder like nunchucks and smacks X-Ray in the face.
Stop! X-Ray opens the door to REVEAL -- a balding MAN wearing a Vassar College t-shirt.  26. He is surprised to be facing four twelve year old boys, o wearing a leather S&M mask.
Hi.
Hello... I’m looking for Max?
I’m Max. Max politely extends his hand. Claude shakes it uncertain
Are you a pedophile?
(to Quentin) If you were a pedophile, would you admit it?
No.
Then why would he?
I’m not a pedophile.
See? We don’t know.
I’m not!
Do you have the money, Claude?
Yeah.

Okay, yes you come now to basement but no shoes. INT. FABRIZIO’S HOUSE - BASEMENT - DAY CLOSE UP: A SEX DOLL’S lifeless eyes and open mouth. Clau inspects the doll carefully, gently opens her mouth.  27.
And is this her original mouth and tongue?
I don’t know. Claude notices the kids looking at him strangely.
(covering) Oh, oh. You think? No, no! I want Peaches for the carpool lane... so I can get home to my family faster.
Ohhhhh...
We thought you wanted to fuck it.
Ha ha terrific! I think you mean, “Fuck her.” Claude hands Fabrizio a wad of cash.
Here you go. Four hundred.
No, it’s five-fifty. That’s what we said in the ad.
Yeah, but now that I’m here and looking at it and it’s out of the box -- I feel like it’s only worth four. Quentin holds up his hand.

Claude, you have to see it from our side: we're running a business here. If you don’t like the price, no hard feelings. Have a great day. The boys look at Quentin like he’s crazy. Quentin turns t Max.  28.
Max, give that married couple a call and tell them they can pick up the doll. Claude considers this.
Well, I don’t want to lose her. He pulls out some more bills, hands Fabrizio all the cash pulls out a sundress from his satchel.
Can you help me dress her?

Of course, Claude. The Boys dutifully lift up the doll’s arms as Claude pull sundress from his bag and slides it over her arms. EXT. FABRIZIO’S HOUSE - DAY The Boys struggle to carry Peaches to Claude’s Maxima.
You can just toss her in the trunk. He opens the trunk and motions for them to place her insi
Didn't you need her up front for the carpool lane?
«+. Right. He opens the passenger door and the guys put her in. Quen extends his hand.
Best of luck with everything.
... Thank you. Claude gets in the car and drives off. They wave goodbye.
I liked Claude. He was relatable.  29.

(realizing) Dammit! We should’ve asked him for a ride to the mall. OVER DEMI LOVATO’S “CONFIDENT”: EXT. FABRIZIO’S HOUSE - LATER The garage OPENS and the boys step out, rolling out a wom bike and a seven year old girl’s bike.

-- The boys apply liberal amounts of sunblock to any expo skin. They help each other apply lotion to their necks. -- Velcro straps are fastened around ELBOW PADS. -- HELMET straps are tightened. -- Water bottles are inserted into water bottle slots ina backpack. -- X-Ray clips on a REFLECTOR VEST.
They’re about to set off.
(checks watch) Come on, come on! We’re behind schedule. Max runs back into the garage and comes out with the PAINTBALL GUN.
Why are you bringing that?
You never know... if the girls come at us... (holds up gun) We can bribe them with this to let us go. Everyone loves paintball guns. Quentin holds the little pink bike.  30.
I’m not riding this. It can’t fit my balls. (then, to X-Ray) Switch. Quentin takes X-Ray’s bike. Max leans over to X-Ray.
You gotta stand up for yourself.
It’s fine...
Let's a’go! They look over to see Fabrizio. He’s riding a road bike w clip-ons. They pull out onto the street. Max sees Quentin isn’t wea his helmet.
Quentin, put on your helmet! We’re going on a main street!
Hannah sits in math class, bored. A MATH TEACHER motions right triangle on the board.
So if side “A” is 4, and side “B” is 9, what is the length of the hypotenuse? Everyone is silent. Hannah looks up, notices Lily in the little window in the classroom door. Hannah raises her ha
Hannah! Give it a go, girl!
May I go to the bathroom?
("why do I bother?”) Take a pass.  31.
Lily holds out her phone to Hannah and Jaslyn, who’s also joined. A map with a blinking, moving cursor is on the sc
I put on “Find Your iPhone.”
A map with a blinking, moving cursor on the screen.
That little shit left school. Where is he going in the middle of a school day?
Maybe they’re going to the cops.
Now I think we need to call Jordy.
No, we just need to find them before Jordy finds out the molly’s missing.
(staring at phone) Where are they going?
The boys bike down an empty street, laughing and smiling. They try to bike with no hands. This is freedom.

-- They unsuccessfully try to pull wheelies, jump curbs, bunny-hop, etc. -- The boys bike through a SPRINKLER, legs outstretched. -- A dog runs up to the edge of a fence and BARKS at them The boys, startled, speed off, laughing. Pure joy.
The boys walk their bikes through a cross-walk.  32.
«+. Did you know a blow job and oral sex are the same thing?
The boys are stopped at a red light.
«+. Jeremy Renner is the best Jason Bourne. He’s Hawkeye. Matt Damon was only good in “We Bought a Zoo.”
The boys try getting air off a speed bump.
... You know who’s gotten really good at comebacks? Atticus L.

Hey, kiddos. Jordy swings open her door, KNOCKING X-Ray and the drone the ground.
Run! They grab X-Ray and take off into the PARKING STRUCTURE.
The drone! We have to go back for it.
I don’t wanna die!
She picks up the drone box from the ground and smiles.
Jordy's truck slowly drives down the aisles looking for t boys... They’re nowhere to be seen.

(to herself) Come here, little babies... Come to mama... Hannah scans the garage from the passenger window. Nothin They pass a MINIVAN and continue down the row. A WOMAN approaches the mini-van, gets in, and drives off,

head_text.subj: OUR BOYS LYING IN THE NOW-EMPTY PARKING SPOT.

text: They stand, covered in dirt, grease, and oil and scurry o to a nearby stairwell, narrowly avoiding -- LILY’S MINI. She pulls up alongside Jordy’s truck. Lily rolls down her window.
They’re not on the third floor.
We don’t need to find them. They’11 come to us.
The “Pretty Little Liars” theme song PLAYS. Max pulls out Hannah’s phone, checks the caller ID. It reads: CRAZY BIT
(to others) It says “Crazy Bitch.”
Answer it. It could be important. Max answers. The others listen.
Hello?
INT. JORDY’S TRUCK - SAME Jordy speaks into her truck’s bluetooth.
I’m gonna make this real simple: give me my Molly back and I'll let you get back to recess. Max covers the phone, turns to the others.
Who’s Molly? The boys shrug.  68.
(confused) We don’t have your friend.
Molly is drugs. You have Hannah’s bag, which has my drugs.
(eyes go wide) Illegal drugs?
Yes, you stupid fucking cunt!
(covering phone, to others) I think she’s angry.
Do you know who you’re talking to?
Umm, you came up as “Crazy Bitch” on the phone...? Jordy shoots Hannah a dirty look. CLICK.

Alright, here's what’s gonna happen: there’s a playground on the corner of Chandler and Van Nuys. Meet me there in thirty minutes. Call the cops and you’ll never see your family again. Quentin holds out his phone to the others.
I just looked it up. Molly is a sex drug. We’re dealing with nymphomaniacs. This rocks them to their core.

We've been carrying illegal drugs the whole time and we didn’t even know. We’re such idiots. Max opens his bag, pushes the paintball gun aside and gra HANNAH'S BAG. He pulls out the FLINTSTONES PILL BOX.  69. Quentin takes the pill container and tries to open it. He struggles with the child seal.
Let me try. Fabrizio bangs the pill box against the metal railing.
Fuuuuck!
-- They all take turns trying to open the container. -- X-Ray throws it against the wall. -- Max tries using the edge of the step as a fulcrum.
An ELDERLY WOMAN opens the pill bottle for them.
You'll get nice and strong now.
Thank you! She walks off. Fabrizio’s about to pull one out when Quen stops him.
Never touch drugs. Fabrizio carefully dumps a pill onto his outstretched shi On the pill is a SMILEY FACE EMOJI. They look relieved.
I thought it would look different.
What if they spread them into our community?
Well, we don’t know if it’s our community or some other community.
What if it’s a trap?  70.
You think everything’s a trap! It’s a business transaction. They’re businesswomen. If they fuck us, we'll never do business with them again.
I don’t like it.
Like I care.
My dad’s probably on his way home. We have to get the drone.
It’s too dangerous.
(snatches pill box) I’m making the trade, with or without you.
I’m coming with you.
I come, too.
(pointed, to Max) Friends don’t leave friends behind. Max shakes his head.
I’m coming. It’s just... drugs on a playground... I hope there’s no kids there.
The boys sit on the swings, waiting. X-Ray checks his wat
(looking around) This playground is sweet. We should come back here.
Totally. Check out those monkey bars.
Wasn’t talking to you. 71. Jordy’s truck and Lily’s Mini pull up. The girls exit the and approach. Lily holds the drone box. The boys tense.
Strip.
(nervous ) What, why??
How do I know you’re not wearing a wire? The boys are petrified. They look at one another and then slowly unlace their sneakers. Fabrizio casually begins undressing.
(laughs) I’m just fucking with you. (then, serious) Give me my shit. Max pulls Hannah’s bag from his backpack.
Same time. X-Ray approaches Lily. Max walks over to Jordy.
One, two --
(snatching bag) Just give me the bag. Lily gives X-Ray the drone box. Jordy looks through the bag, pulls out the pill box. a shake.
Good boys. Hannah takes the bag, rifles through it. Gives it  72.
My phone’s not in here. Quentin holds up the phone.
That wasn’t part of the deal.
Look, I just want my phone back. I‘1l delete your pictures. We weren't really going to post them.
How do we know we can trust you?
I promise.
Do you pledge it?

What? (then) I'll delete them right in front of you. Quentin looks at the other boys. They nod. Quentin walks and hands the phone to Hannah. She opens her phone to REV the pictures of the BOYS DRESSED IN DRAG. Jordy looks over and cackles. She snatches the phone from Hannah and starts typing.
I’m posting these.
No!!
Jordy, don't... we were just messing with them.
Yeah, that’s what I’m doing... And... posted. Jordy tosses the phone back to Hannah.
And if you delete them, I’11l crush your skull with my thighs. (MORE )
(then) Let's go. Hannah, Jaslyn, and Lily look back at our boys, whose eye start to well up.
(holding tears back) Hannah’s sister will re-post it to her 40,000 followers.

(quiet, holding back tears) Do not cry in front of the girls. The girls mouth “sorry” and follow after Jordy. The boys desperately trying to hold back their tears. As soon as t girls hop in the car, the flood gates open. All four boys BURST INTO TEARS.
The boys, still crying, pedal down the sidewalk in silenc The drone box sits in the basket of Max's bike.
My life is over.
I move back to Italy. Something catches Max’s eye. He drops to the ground.
Hide! The boys quickly duck down between two parked cars.
What now? Max points across the street. They all turn to see X-Ray’ Dad exiting a jewelry store with a small bag. He heads to parked car.
(panicked) Shit.
I don’t think he saw us.  74.
(relieved) Okay, he’s leaving... A YOUNG WOMAN exits the jewelry store and follows X-Ray’s to his car. She gets in.
Who’s that woman?

It’s Dana. She works with my dad. X-Ray’s Dad and the Woman share a passionate KISS in the The boys watch, shell-shocked, as the car drives off. They all fall silent. None of them know what to say. Afte beat --
(quiet) Maybe they’re just friends.
«+. I don’t want to talk about it.
What are you going to tell your mom?
He doesn’t want to talk about it.
My best friend is going through a crisis, so can you mind your own business? Quentin awkwardly puts his arm around X-Ray.
I’m here for you. We all are.
I do sleepover. Max hesitates.
I’1l come by in the morn --  75.
Are you kidding me right now? Our friend needs us.
I already promised Soren. What do you want me to do?
I want you to be there for your friend. You think Soren will be there when shit goes down?
Fuck you, Quentin. I skipped school. I don’t even know where the fuck I am. I could get in so much trouble. I’m risking everything for my friend.
That’s not because you’re a good friend. That’s just because you feel guilty. Admit you’d rather be with Soren.
Yeah, maybe I do. He doesn’t freak out every time I do something without him and he can talk about things other than singing. It’s hard being your friend.
I expect a lot because I give a lot. (then) Fabrizio is a better friend than you and we've only known him three weeks.
Grazie.
(to Max) You're a... (searching for word) Travesty!
(stepping between them) Okay, okay...  76.
You're the most insecure person I’ve ever met.
I thought you were woke, but you’re the least woke person ever.
Fuck you, Quentin, you’re not woke!
My dads are gay! Of course I’m woke!
That’s your excuse for everything!
Eat my ass, honey! You’re the biggest traitor ever. Go jerk off to Mrs. Huberty’s yearbook picture.
That was a secret! Max pushes him. Quentin pushes him back.
Guys, a’stop. They feint pushing one another.
It’s your fault we’re even here!
Have fun when Soren drops you and then you’ll have no squad! Max lamely does a side kick.
No karate!

They look over to see the drone box on the ground. X-Ray picks it up and slams it to the ground. The boys watch in shock. He kicks the box, then picks it up and swings it into a telephone pole. Fabrizio takes a step forward to stop him but Quentin holds him back.  77. X-Ray drops the destroyed box in a trash can.
I’m going home. X-Ray doesn’t wait for the others and starts to bike off. They start to follow. Quentin turns to Max.
Find your own way back.

head_text.subj: ON X-RAY AND FABRIZIO, WITH QUENTIN ON HIS PEGS --

text: Biking down a sidewalk.
Biking down a different sidewalk, alone.
They're all biking down opposite sides of the same street Max sees Quentin and the others turn down a side street a disappear. He shakes his head.
Streetlights hum to life as the sun sets. Max's phone RINGS. He stops and pulls his phone from his backpack. Checks th caller ID: QUENTIN. Max answers. (cool) Hey.
TIGHT ON Quentin.
So, we got stopped by some cops...  78.
Shit! Did you tell them you were Jewish?

They didn’t care. But we told them everything about the girls and the drugs. They’re being really cool about it and said they’d let us go if you bring the real drugs. Do you still have them? Max pulls a FLINTSTONES VITAMIN PILL BOX from his pocket.
Yeah. Text me the address. Quentin nervously glances over his shoulder to REVEAL -- Jordy menacingly playing with a butterfly knife in an ABANDONED RAILYARD.
Okay.
Hey, and I’m sorry for earlier. I didn’t mean what I said.
And I’m sorry I told everyone that you jerked off to the lunch lady. Jordy shakes her head. She motions for Quentin to wrap it
Maybe the cops can give us a ride back to school.
Good idea. I’1ll ask. (then, to Jordy) Can you drive us back for our recital, Officer St. Cloud?
His eyes go wide -- “Officer St. Cloud?”
X-Ray and Fabrizio look up -- “Officer St. Cloud?”  Jordy glares at Quentin, doesn’t say anything. Quentin nervously puts the phone back to his ear.
Officer St. Cloud said yes.
Okay. Thanks for letting me know. I’1ll see you soon. Max hangs up. He thinks, then makes another call. 79.
INT. SOREN’S BEDROOM - SAME Soren studies three OUTFITS laid out on his bed. His phon rings.
(into phone) What’s up, Bitch?
(urgent) Hey, I need your help.
What’s going on? Kinda in the middle of something.
Some older girls kidnapped Quentin, X-Ray and Fabrizio.
What do you want me to do?
I didn’t know who else to call. The girls are in your brother's grade. Maybe he could call them or something.
I’m sure Quentin and those guys are just being weak.
It’s real! They’re in trouble!
I told you, I’m busy!  80.
«+. Okay, forget it. Max hangs up, unsure what to do.

Saticoy and Van Nuys. This is a far cry from the bright lights of Ventura Boulevard. A graffitied billboard for a long-shuttered strip club hangs above a blown out ticketi office. Jordy’'s headlights illuminate Quentin, X-Ray, and Fabriz all huddled together on the ground. Jordy grabs one of the boys’ bikes from the bed of her tr and tosses it to the ground.
They speak in hushed tones.
We're literally involved in a kidnapping.
Don’t be so dramatic. We didn’t kidnap them. We just took them.
We're kidnapped, too.
No, we’re not.
Tell Jordy that we need to go. What’s her problem?
She’s always been crazy. When she was fourteen, she dated a thirty year old.
Isn't that illegal?
Yeah. She should be in jail.  81.
Hannah, you need to tell her we need to go. Hannah shakes her head, scared. Jordy grabs the other bikes from the back of her truck.

You think you can switch out my drugs for kids vitamins and there won't be consequences? She tosses the bike on top of the other and walks back to truck. She rummages inside, grabs something from the glov compartment. Quentin looks around for an escape.
(whispers) Okay, I’m going to cause a diversion by pretending I have appendicitis. Behind them, Jordy walks over to the bikes and DOUSES the with lighter fluid.

(oblivious) When they come over to see what’s wrong, you guys grab the bikes and haul ass. (then) Ready? On three -- WHOOSH! The boys’ bike IGNITE into a pyre of twisted meta and rubber. The boys watch in horror as their only way ho goes up in flames.
Hey, Jordy, I need to get going. I have dinner with my grand --
No one goes anywhere.

Max pedals furiously down the sidewalk. He skid stops and races over to a TRASHCAN. He rummages through it until he pulls out --  82. THE DRONE. He tears open the box and inspects the damaged contents. lifts a propeller that’s broken in half.
Jordy sits on her truck bumper. The TRUCK NUTZ dangle bet her legs. She cracks her neck, checks her watch. The remains of the bikes smolder in the background.
I need to go to the bathroom.
Hold it in.
I could get a UTI!
(shaking her head) Hannah, take the dwarf. Quentin bristles as Hannah leads him off.
Quentin has his back to Hannah. He looks over his shoulde
I can’t pee while you’re here.
Believe me, I’m not trying to look. He starts to go.
She didn’t have to say that.
What?
That I’m a dwarf. I’m not a dwarf.
Okay.  83.
I don't suffer from dwarfism. That’s offensive to me and it’s offensive to dwarfs. (then) Why are you friends with her?
When you’re in high school, sometimes you're not friends with your friends.
My best friend is ditching us for the popular kids because he thinks we're losers.
Why?
I don’t know. Because we’re not into sports, we’re into singing.
Are you good?
We won the tri-county Voice of an Angel tournament last year.
That’s cool. I wish I could sing.
Really?
Yeah, I’m so jealous of people who can sing. This buoys Quentin’s spirits. They start to head back, Quentin walking a little bit taller.
Hey, you should come to our recital later.
I hate to break it to you, but I don’t think we’re getting out of here any time soon.  84.
We HEAR a sputtering hum. ON an OLDER COUPLE -- SOMETHING comes right at them. They duck out of the way.
The bored DRIVER’s eyes suddenly go wide and she REAR-END the car in front of her.

Sputtering down the middle of the street, like a drunken bumble bee. The drone drops five feet, swerves to the lef then coughs its way back to its flight path. It turns down a street, rising higher and higher.
Manning the drone from his iPhone while simultaneously biking.
Taking in the location from above:

head_text.subj: -- THE BOYS HUDDLED BY THEIR BURNING BIKES

text: (Note: it has a striking resemblance to the GRAND THEFT A level the boys played earlier.)
Surveilling the layout on the drone controller.
THE DRONE, sputtering, flying erratically. It suddenly dr twenty-five feet. Stabilizes, then drops again.
Do you hear that noise? Jordy and the girls look up to see the drone quickly descending like a comet, flying past them and crashing in JORDY’S WINDSHIELD.
What the fuck?! She pulls the drone from the cracked windshield. She sees note attached to it. She opens it.
(reading) “Moist.” The Girls grumble.
Ugh! / I hate that word. / What kind of pervert would write that?
(to X-Ray and Fabrizio) It’s Max!
Leave now and you won’t get hurt! Jordy flicks open her butterfly knife, waves it toward th boys.
I’m about to start cuttin’ off fingers.
(shrieking)

Perched on the roof, the paintball gun pressed into his shoulder, like a sniper. His finger touches the trigger. adjusts the sight -- Jordy is in the CROSS-HAIRS. And he FIRES -- And hits Fabrizio in the kneecap!  86.
Ahhhh!! I bleeding! (then, checking) No, it’s paint.
Dammit! Max starts SHOOTING, spraying paint everywhere. They all cover, hiding behind Jordy’s car. Jordy grabs Quentin and puts the knife to his fingers.
Stop shooting or I cut his pinky!
Jordy! Stop! / What are you doing?!

(calling to Max) What’s it gonna be, tough guy? In the shadows, Max cautiously steps down a wooden ladder attached to the building, making certain to put both feet each rung. He jumps the last one, dropping eighteen inche the ground. He lifts his arms up in surrender.
(nervously) Don’t hurt me.
I am gonna hurt you, but first you're gonna give me the drugs.
The paintball gun is messily taped to the back of Max’s T shirt. Max pulls the Flintstone Pill Box from his pocket.
(re pills) I won’t let you destroy my community -- or any community -- with these.  87.

I’m going to enjoy this. She shoves Quentin out of the way and charges Max with th outstretched knife. Max reaches behind down his back for his paintball gun, b he’s taped it TOO LOW. He reaches up his back, but it’s TOO HIGH.

Now running full speed, snarling and determined, just lik the pitbull chasing Josh Brolin through the river in “No Country For Old Men.” As she leaps, Max pulls his shirt over his head, giving h access to the gun. And at the last moment -- HE SHOOTS HER POINT BLANK IN THE FACE. Jordy goes down, writhing on the ground, her face covered BLUE PAINT splatter.
Abhh!! Fuck! Ahhh! Fuck!! Max DROPS the gun in shock -- that wasn’t a video game.
Holy sheet! You shot her in the fucking face.
Oh my god. Quentin runs to Jordy’s truck, hops in, and pulls the key from her visor.
Got her keys!
Are you serious?
She burned our bikes. It’s the only way to make it back in time. (then, to X-Ray) But only if you still want to sing.  88.
Fuck, yeah I wanna sing. This might be the last time we ever sing together. SPLAT! A paintball EXPLODES on the windshield beside X-Ra face.
Jordy leveling the paintball gun on the boys. She has a crazed look in her eye.
I‘1l fucking end you!

The guys jump into the truck, narrowly avoiding the paint Quentin turns the ignition and keeps turning it, shreddin the starter. The truck REVERSES at high speed, kicking up a cloud of d before missing the exit and SMASHING THROUGH THE CHAIN LI FENCE, FISHTAILING out onto the street. INT. JORDY’S TRUCK - CONTINUOUS Heavy breathing.
Seat belts. We hear the CLICKS of belts being buckled. Quentin puts the truck in DRIVE and takes off.
Disgusted, Jordy points the paintball gun at Hannah's fac who instinctively puts her hands up.
Take me to the recital, fam.
A HELL’S ANGEL rumbles down the street. He looks over to right to see Jordy’s truck -- he double takes as it looks like the truck is driving itself.
The seat has been moved all the way forward and all the w up, yet Quentin can still barely see over the steering wh Max, X-Ray, and Fabrizio are crowded beside him. Max look his phone’s GPS.
Take this ramp! Quentin jerks across two lanes of traffic to make the 170 freeway entrance. He steadies the truck.
You're doing good.
Thanks. (then, quiet) You came back for us.
(solemn) I pledged it. Quentin reaches over and Max takes his hand -- they do th “pledge” clasp. Up ahead, the rush hour traffic is slowing down.
Shit. There’s too much traffic. We’re not going to make it.
(pointing to the shoulder) There’s no one in that lane.
Good eye, Maxwell! Quentin swerves onto the shoulder and guns it. The Truck FLIES past the stopped traffic.
Why doesn’t anyone use this lane?!  90.
Probably because people are sheep.

head_text.subj: A SIREN SOUNDS. A STATE TROOPER IS BEHIND THEM, LIGHTS

text: Fuck. Five-oh.
Now we’ll miss the recital.
We’re gonna get grounded.

We're not getting grounded and we're not gonna miss that recital. Quentin SWERVES ACROSS FIVE LANES OF TRAFFIC TO GET ON TO 101 FREEWAY. The boys cheer. The cheers fade when the see the gridlock ahead.
LA has a real traffic problem. A SIREN screams as flashing lights pull up behind them.
The STATE TROOPER barks into the police radio.
Code 3. 2-Adam-4 in pursuit of a black Ford F-150 heading southbound on the 405. Possible drunk driver. JORDY’S TRUCK
What’s happening? Max tilts the REARVIEW MIRROR completely toward the passe side.
Cop's still there. Lose him! We could get grounded!

This guy’s so erratic!  91. Quentin cuts the wheel, hops off the freeway and onto an EMBANKMENT. The engine WHIRS as the truck OFFROADS up the hill. The Cop Car attempts to follow them, but BOTTOMS OU when it hits the embankment, shooting SPARKS everywhere. The black and white slides to a stop.

Silence. Hannah drives. Lily and Jaslyn sit in the back. Jordy stares straight ahead, her finger dancing on the trigger of Max’s PAINTBALL GUN. In the dark of night, wit the dried blue paint cracked across her skin, she looks possessed.
A dozen cars snake into the driveway, passing a school Marquee that reads:
“WINTER CONCERT: MANIFEST DESTINY”
The boys pull up a block away from the school.
We can walk from here.
Wait. I can’t bring drugs into the school. It’s a drug-free zone.
If you leave it in the car, some little kids might think they’re vitamins and O.D. Max pulls out a pen and writes a note. He tapes it to the pill box.
We'll come back later and give it to an adult. Quentin shuts off the truck (leaving it in “Drive”). They quickly exit and start running toward the school.  92.

JORDY’S TRUCK BEGINS TO SLOWLY ROLL DOWN THE STREET. It picks up speed, side-swiping a row of parked cars and leaving a trail of broken side mirrors in its wake. It ho the curb, rolls through a grassy median. Cars honk and swerve.
A SPOTLIGHT shines from the Police Cruiser as a COP looks any sign of the truck. He talks into the radio.

(into radio) I’m on Hazeltine. Pretty quiet over here. Wait, I’m hearing something -- A sound -- metal scraping? -- comes closer... and... clos Car alarms begin going off. The Cop shines his spotlight then stops on -- THE LION.
(into radio) Holy shit! The Cop looks back just in time -- To see Jordy’s truck barreling down the street BACKWARDS his cruiser.
The Truck T-BONES the POLICE CAR. The Lion runs off into woods.
The boys race up the stairs and burst into the school --

In the harsh fluorescent light, we see the toll the day h taken on them: ripped and dirty clothes. Grimy faces. The look like they’ve been through battle.  93. The boys race down an empty hallway, turn a corner and re civilization: STUDENT VOLUNTEERS serve refreshments to PARENTS, TEACHERS, and SIBLINGS. The boys freeze as peopl look up and stare. The boys race past them toward the side entrance to the auditorium when they hear a stern voice.
Xavier Raymond. They all turn to see X-Ray’s Dad. Quentin turns to X-Ray.
I’m going to tell him it was my fault.
We'll tell him it was all of us.
No. X-Ray nervously walks over to his dad. The others watch. X-RAY’S DAD What happened to your clothes? You're filthy. What’s going on with you? X-Ray stares at his feet.
(quiet) I broke your drone. X-RAY’S DAD Speak up. Take responsibility for your actions. (then) This is why you’re going to Camden next year. You need to learn character.
I don’t want to go. X-RAY’S DAD Well, it’s not your decision. After the show, we’re going to sit down and have a talk about respect and honesty. X-Ray looks his father directly in the eye.  94.
Is Dana going to be there? Beat. X-RAY’S DAD Xavier-Raymond, it’s not --
Like I said, I don’t want to go. X-Ray heads back to the others, surprised at his newfound courage.

I/E. JORDY’S TRUCK - NIGHT Two other Black and Whites are on the scene, surveying th damage of Jordy’s totaled Truck and the police cruiser. A COP inspects the inside of the truck. Lowers the visor. Pops open the glove compartment, pulls out the registrati He’s about to step out when something on the floor catche his eye. He reaches over and picks it up. It’s a FLINTSTONES PILL BOX with a note taped to the side “ILLEGAL SEX DRUGS -- DO NOT EAT” Off his look.
The guys frantically change into costume. Soren walks ove
Hey bitches, saw your pics on Instagram. Did it take you a long time to do your makeup?
(stymied) -.. We didn’t do it ourselves. The boys deflate.  95.
For the record, I’m not coming to your birthday.
(scoffs) You think you’re still invited? You and your squad is tragic.
(correcting) We are tragic. Soren shakes his head and walks off. Robin, dressed in al BLACK, runs up to them.
You’re not in costume?! You’re on in thirty seconds!
I’m on your mom in thirty seconds!
She's still in San Diego! I just talked to her on the phone! He races off. The boys hurriedly change into their costum

The curtain is down. Mrs. Grandy, wearing an Old West-sty dress, walks onto the stage to polite applause. She sits at the piano and begins PLAYING the jaunty opening to “GH RIDERS IN THE SKY.” Robin pulls up the curtain to REVEAL --

head_text.subj: THE BOYS CHORUS ENTERING FROM THE SIDES OF THE STAGE, ALL

text: Dozens of iPhones go up, poised to record.

A few boys “ride” in on papier-maché horse heads connecte broom sticks. Our boys proudly step to the front row. Their LASSOS are latched onto their pleather belts.  96. As they sing, they use hand motions and choreography to a out the lyrics and give the audience a better sense of th song’s story.
(singing) An old cowboy went riding out one dark and windy daaaaaay / Upon a ridge he rested as he went along his waaaaaaay... The SONG plays over the following --
The lights of the school can be seen a block away. Jordy and the girls approach the accident scene. Police lights, fire trucks and ambulances are everywhere. The Girls are alarmed by the carnage.
Oh my god. They’re dead. Jordy sees her crumpled up truck. She slams the dashboard tucks the paintball gun into her waistband.
They’re dead.
Our boys step to the front, now holding their LASSOS. The twirl them over their heads, while continuing to sing.

(singing) A bolt of fear went through him as they thundered through the skyyyyy--- The boys now lower their lassos and deftly jump in and ou the rope. The audience APPLAUDS. BOYS CHORUS (CONT’D) For he saw the riders coming hard and he heard their mournful
Entering from the back. With her suede fringe jacket and paint, she looks like she’s part of the show. In the audience, a FATHER nudges his daughter and points Jordy.
Oh, look, it’s a Native American. Jordy heads toward the stage, followed closely by the oth girls.
(whispering) Are you nuts? There are parents here.
They spot Jordy. Uh oh. They share a look -- there’s nowh to run.
Yippie yi oohhhh... All the boys but Max drop their ropes and begin to form a human pyramid, still singing.
Hannah, Lily, and Jaslyn step in front of Jordy.
(growling) MOVE. She lifts her shirt and pulls out the PAINTBALL GUN. Lily Jaslyn, frightened, run back toward the exit.
Their faces gaunt, their eyes were blurred / Their shirts all soaked with sweat...
Soren and some other bigger kid form the base, followed b Ray, Fabrizio, and Quentin.

Hannah holds her ground. Jordy shoves Hannah out of the w  98. BOYS CHORUS (CONT’D) He's riding hard to catch that herd But he ain't caught em yet... Max climbs to the top and continues to twirl his rope. Th audience goes nuts.

Leveling the paintball gun at Max. As she’s about to shoot, Hannah SHOVES her from behind. J squeezes the trigger as she trips, which causes her to mi fire and shoot Soren IN THE FACE. Over the singing, we HEAR:
Owww ! He collapses... Which causes the whole pyramid to collapse. The deaf Mrs. Grandy, eyes closed, oblivious, keeps playing. The audience turns, sees Jordy wielding the paintball gun
Stay in your seats. It’s just a paintball gu -- A rope LASSOS her.
